name: Department Of Horse-Drawn Vehicles
description: A place connected to food production or animal husbandry; adventurers could hire mounts, resupply, or quell beasts.
atmosphere: The building is filled with the rich scent of leather, wood, and the earthy smell of horses. The sound of vehicles being inspected and the gentle whinny of horses creates a practical, transportation-focused atmosphere. The air carries the promise of travel and the essential nature of transportation in the city.
